question: Provide PMIDs supporting that RCSD1 RCSD1::ABL1 Fusion confers sensitivity to Imatinib.
cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'RCSD1 RCSD1::ABL1 Fusion'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Imatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Imatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Imatinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'BCR BCR::ABL1 Fusion AND ABL1 E453K'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Dasatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Dasatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Dasatinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

WHERE (

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'BRAF V600E AND CDKN2A Deletion AND CDKN2B Deletion AND TET2 E796K AND BAX L76R AND AXIN2 P455K'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Vemurafenib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Vemurafenib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Vemurafenib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Gemcitabine')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Gemcitabine'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Gemcitabine')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Docetaxel')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Docetaxel'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Docetaxel')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'EGFR L858R OR EGFR T790M'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Deguelin')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Deguelin'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Deguelin')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'TMB High'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Durvalumab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Durvalumab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Durvalumab')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Nivolumab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Nivolumab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Nivolumab')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'PIK3CA Mutation'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Celecoxib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Celecoxib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Celecoxib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'PIK3CA H1047R OR PIK3CA H1047Y OR PIK3CA H1047L OR PIK3CA H1047D OR PIK3CA H1047I OR PIK3CA H1047N OR PIK3CA H1047P OR PIK3CA H1047Q OR PIK3CA H1047T'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Palbociclib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Palbociclib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Palbociclib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

placeholders.variant_name: PIK3CA H1047R OR PIK3CA H1047Y OR PIK3CA H1047L OR PIK3CA H1047D OR PIK3CA H1047I OR PIK3CA H1047N OR PIK3CA H1047P OR PIK3CA H1047Q OR PIK3CA H1047T

question: Provide PMIDs supporting that KDM6A Loss confers sensitivity to Olaparib.
cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'KDM6A Loss'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Olaparib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Olaparib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Olaparib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
